thread.title: Nicole Kidman says Keith Urban didn't call for four months | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Nicole Kidman says Keith Urban didn't call for four months | Daily Mail Online

author: Sarah Jones For Dailymail.Com
title: Nicole Kidman says Keith Urban didn't call for four months | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The daytime talk show host flashed a photo that the former American Idol judge, 49, posted of the first time the lovebirds met. 'Oh God,' Nicole blushed as she put her head down in embarrassment. 'We met that night': The daytime talk show host flashed a photo that the former American Idol judge, 49, posted of the first time the lovebirds met Love at first sight: The 49-year-old actress confessed that she had 'such a crush on him' Keith shared the Instagram snapshot last June 2016 in honor of the couple's 10-year wedding anniversary. 'Our very first photo together 2005, minutes after being introduced to each other. HAPPY ANNIVERSARY BABY. L VE YOU - KU,' he captioned the stunning image of the pair. 'People are awful,' the Lion actress laughed. 'And how did we end up together?' 'Well we met and that night - the craziest thing is to have a photo of when you first met. Someone just took that photo and sent it to us but I remember thinking I had such a crush on him, and he wasn't interested in me.' 'That's not true': Ellen protested, saying, 'How is that possible? And did he explain why he didn't? He must have just been shy, he must have been overwhelmed with emotion' After the Emmy Award-winning host questioned her side of the story, Nicole further explained: 'There's certain things, and I think anyone in a marriage would agree with this, you just don't, just leave that. 'We're here now and it's all good. We don't need to hash up all that stuff right? So I should just shut my mouth,' she joked. 'Really? I don't know. Seems like he didn't like you,' Ellen teased. 'That you would stay with him is weird.' 'She's amazing in it': Meanwhile. the Oscar-winning starlet is set to star as Celeste Wright in the limited series Big Little Lies, produced by and co-starring Reese Witherspoon, 40 As the audience broke into laughter the wife of beauty Portia de Rossi said: 'Really, y'all are adorable together.' Meanwhile. the Oscar-winning starlet is set to star as Celeste Wright in the limited series Big Little Lies, produced by and co-starring Reese Witherspoon, 40. The Legally Blonde actress portrays Madeline Mackenzie in the show which also features an all-star lineup including Alexander Skarsgård, Laura Dern, Shailene Woodley and Zoë Kravitz. Based on Liane Moriarty's 2014 novel, Big Little Lies centers on a group of mothers 'whose perfect lives begin to unravel.' Blonde beauty: Nicole will make her guest appearance on Thursday's episode of The Ellen DeGeneres Show Read more:
